API Reference¶

This is the class and function reference of scikit-learn. Please refer to the full user guide for further details, as the class and function raw specifications may not be enough to give full guidelines on their uses. For reference on concepts repeated across the API, see glossary.

Base classes¶

models.base_class.SMBase(n_subdims[, …])

Base class of Subspace Method

models.base_class.KernelSMBase(n_subdims[, …])

Base class of Kernel Subspace Method

models.base_class.ConstrainedSMBase(…[, …])

Base class of Constrained Subspace Method

models.base_class.KernelCSMBase(n_subdims, …)

Base class of Kernel Constrained Subspace Method

models.base_class.MSMInterface

Prediction interface of Mutual Subspace Method

Model classes¶

models.SubspaceMethod(n_subdims[, …])

Mutual Subspace Method

models.MutualSubspaceMethod(n_subdims[, …])

Mutual Subspace Method

models.KernelMSM(n_subdims[, normalize, …])

Kernel Mutual Subspace Method

models.ConstrainedMSM(n_subdims, n_gds_dims)

Constrained Mutual Subspace Method

models.KernelCMSM(n_subdims, n_gds_dims[, …])

Kernel Constrained Mutual Subspace Method

Utils classes¶

utils.base

Mathematical utilities

utils.evaluation

utils.kernel_functions

Kernel functions
